00035 #ifndef __included_llist_h
00036 #define __included_llist_h
00037 
00038 namespace CrissCross
00039 {
00040     namespace Data
00041     {
00042         template < class T > class LListItem
00043         {
00044           protected:
00045           public:
00046             T m_data;
00047             LListItem *m_next;
00048             LListItem *m_previous;
00049 
00050             LListItem ();
00051             ~LListItem ();
00052         };
00053 
00054 
00055         template < class T > class LList
00056         {
00057           protected:
00058             LListItem < T > *m_first;    // Pointer to first node
00059             LListItem < T > *m_last;    // Pointer to last node
00060 
00061             mutable LListItem < T > *m_previous;    // Used to get quick access
00062             mutable int m_previousIndex;    // for sequential reads (common)
00063 
00064             int m_numItems;
00065 
00066           protected:
00067             inline LListItem < T > *GetItem ( int index ) const;
00068 
00069           public:
00070             LList ();
00071             LList ( const LList < T > & );
00072 
00073             ~LList ();
00074 
00075             LList & operator = ( const LList < T > & );
00076 
00077             inline void PutData ( const T & newdata );    // Adds in data at the end  
00078             void PutDataAtEnd ( const T & newdata );
00079             void PutDataAtStart ( const T & newdata );
00080             void PutDataAtIndex ( const T & newdata, int index );
00081 
00082             inline T GetData ( int index ) const;    // slow unless sequential
00083             inline T *GetPointer ( int index ) const;    // slow unless sequential
00084             void RemoveData ( int index );    // slow unless sequential
00085             inline void RemoveDataAtEnd ();
00086             int FindData ( const T & data );    // -1 means 'not found'
00087 
00088             inline int Size () const;    // Returns the total size of the array
00089             inline bool ValidIndex ( int index ) const;
00090 
00091             void Empty ();            // Resets the array to empty    
00092             void EmptyAndDelete ();    // As above, deletes all data as well
00093 
00094             inline T operator [] ( int index );
00095         };
00096     }
00097 }
00098 #    include "llist.cpp"

00100 #endif
